channel.title: ::pickup For ZDR
channel.description:
Anyway i can add a pickup for zdr? :confused: I already tried a lot of ::pickups. If you don't know what it is don't post Retarted Stuff like this:
mg U newb! do Stupid nobo Al1 sourcez ccome with Pickup@# NOOB@
So If you do know what im asking, Please help :X

item.title: ::pickup For ZDR
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Actually, if you already have the command you should try adding 00 infront of the number e.g

For cash - 00995 1

You can already see this is the code above

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup For ZDR
item.dc:creator: @mrduck mrduck
item.description:
@mrduck wrote:

doesnt just this work? :

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("It needs to be 5 digits: ::pickup 00995 1");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
